privacy_policy.intro_content: Welcome to Agility Software Factory. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website.
privacy_policy.info_content: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, participate in activities on the website, or otherwise contact us.
privacy_policy.info_list_1: Contact information (name, email address, phone number).
privacy_policy.info_list_3: Any other information you choose to provide in contact forms.
privacy_policy.usage_content: We use the information we collect or receive to:
privacy_policy.usage_list_1: Facilitate account creation and logon process (if applicable).
privacy_policy.usage_list_2: Send you administrative information and service updates.
privacy_policy.usage_list_3: Respond to your inquiries and offer support.
privacy_policy.usage_list_4: Improve our user experience and services.
privacy_policy.usage_list_5: Send marketing and promotional communications (you can opt-out at any time).
privacy_policy.sharing_content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share data with service providers who help us operate our business (such as web hosting, data analysis, customer service), always under strict confidentiality agreements.
privacy_policy.security_content: We use robust administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information. However, no transmission over the Internet or electronic storage system is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee its absolute security, although we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect it.
privacy_policy.cookies_content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information. This information is used to analyze trends, administer the site, track users' movements around the website, and gather demographic information about our user base as a whole.
privacy_policy.rights_content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, update, or delete your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the provided channels.
